l_mqtt_url_help: Url to the senergy mqtt broker
l_iot_repo_url_help: Url to the senergy iot repository
l_auth_url_help: Url to the senergy authentication service
h_user: user name (because of the missing user/owner system, this value will currently not be evaluated)
h_pw: password (because of the missing user/owner system, this value will currently not be evaluated)
h_startupdelay: delays startup of connector, to give zway-server time to initialize all devices before
h_handle_commands: Register and handle commands of the SENERGY-Platform
h_multi_gateway: Use plugin in multi gateway mode
h_multi_gateway_device_management: URL of the multi gateway device manager (only used when multi gateway is enabled)
